title: Does Apple consider iPads cheap alternatives to their Macs? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Apple considers them computers in their own right, because the those two types of computers—iPads and iMacs—have quite different use cases, as does the iPhone and the iPod also have separate use cases. Think of them as different models with different engines from a car manufacturer produces vehicles for different uses even though they all use gasoline to get you from point A to B: a compact, an SUV (once called a station wagon), a pickup truck, and so on.
